DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Two Daily Disposable Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must 18 45 year age ( inclusive ) presbyopic add . 2 . The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . This recorded Case Report Form ( CRF ) . 3 . The subject must willing wear study lenses least 8 hour per day , least 6 day visit . 4 . The subject must current successful spherical soft contact lens wearer eye . 5 . The subject must appear willing able adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 6 . The subject 's subjective refraction must result vertex correct spherical contact lens prescription range 1.00D 6.00D ( inclusive ) eye . 7 . The subject 's refractive astigmatism must less equal 0.75D eye . 8 . The subject must corrective visual acuity 6/9 ( 20/30 ) good eye . 9 . The subject must require visual correction eye ( monofit monovision allow ) . 1 . Any ocular systemic allergy disease may interfere contact lens wear . 2 . Any systemic disease , autoimmune disease , use medication , may interfere contact lens wear . 3 . Clinically significant ( Grade 3 4 ) corneal edema , corneal vascularization , corneal staining , infiltrate abnormality cornea would contraindicate contact lens wear . 4 . Clinically significant ( Grade 3 4 ) tarsal abnormality bulbar injection might interfere contact lens wear . 5 . Any ocular infection . 6 . Any corneal distortion result previous hard rigid gas permeable contact lens wear . 7 . Currently pregnant lactating ( subject become pregnant study discontinue ) . 8 . Diabetes . 9 . Infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis ) immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) . 10 . Amblyopia 11 . Evidence lid abnormality infection ( include blepharitis/meibomitis ) 12 . Conjunctival abnormality infection . 13 . Any active ocular disease . 14 . Employee family member staff investigational site .
